sentences: Lina Maria Hedlund (born 28 March 1978) is a Swedish singer and member of the pop group Alcazar.

She has participated in Melodifestivalen a number of times, in Melodifestivalen 2002 along with her sister, singer Hanna Hedlund with the song "Big Time Party", in Melodifestivalen 2003 as a solo singer, and in Melodifestivalen 2009, 2010 and 2014 as a member of the pop trio Alcazar.
In 2007, Hedlund joined the pop group Alcazar after the departure of Magnus Carlsson and Annika Kj√¶rgaard; her first gig with the group was at the G-A-Y nightclub in London, UK.
In 2011 Hedlund made her first appearance as a TV presenter in the musical gameshow Copycat Singers broadcast on TV3.
She participates in Melodifestivalen 2019 with the song "Victorious", in the semifinal she qualified to the final.
On 3 September 2019, Hedlund was announced as a presenter of Melodifestivalen 2020 along with David Sundin and Linnea Henriksson.
Lina and her boyfriend Nassim Al Fakir have two sons: Tilo, born 20 March 2012, and Eide, born 6 October 2016.
